text: Figure 33: 2.2 Chrisp Street (indicative) SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION Tower Hamlets Local Plan 421 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS |Site information|Details| ||| |Relevant Permissions|PA/16/01612 - Comprehensive redevelopment of the site with 19 new buildings ranging from 3 to 25 storeys providing 643 residential units, market enhancement, refurbishment of retained Festival of Britain buildings, reconfiguration and replacement of existing and provision of new commercial uses including new cinema, alterations and additions to existing Idea Store, flexible affordable workspace/ community space, office space, retail, financial and professional services and caf√©/restaurant floor space, public house, hot food takeaway; upgrade and provision of new public open space including child play space.|
